comments.text: This is a meta to track work needed to eradicate any use of Storage synchronous APIs on the main-thread.

comments.author: fehe@hotmail.com
comments.creator: fehe@hotmail.com
comments.raw_text: I suspect bug 648232 should be on this list, unless it will be somehow covered by one of the already listed bugs.  Comments?
comments.text: I suspect bug 648232 should be on this list, unless it will be somehow covered by one of the already listed bugs.  Comments?

(In reply to IU from comment #2)
> I suspect bug 648232 should be on this list, unless it will be somehow
> covered by one of the already listed bugs.  Comments?

that bug is caused by the cache evitCentries stuff and the out of process plug-ins being initialized when cookies are cleared. It's not Storage stuff that makes that slow.
